roleset.name: to make urban, like a city

role.descr: Instrument or Manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: Descriptive, society
example.text: In our modern, urbanized society, many like to imagine their own existence is bloodless, clean, and sanitary.

example.name: Birds
example.text: Birds-1 are being urbanized *-1 by people in outdoor cafes feeding them.
example.arg: by people in outdoor cafes feeding them

roleset.note: Frame by Claire based on expansion via VerbNet; nominal 'urbanization' based on BOLT-7. VN class other_cos-45.4.

example.name: nominal rel: urbanization
example.text: The urbanization of the United States has progressed throughout its entire history.
